                    int nIter,
                    int nProt,
                    double alpha_0)
        DSMGenerator constructor.
        Parameters:
        tDataSet - Training data set to be reduced.
        nIter - Number of iterations to be executed.
        nProt - Number of prototypes to be generated.
        alpha_0 - Alpha0 constant parameter of the algorithm.

      • DSMGenerator

                    int nIter,
                    double percSize,
                    double alpha_0)
        DSMGenerator constructor.
        Parameters:
        tDataSet - Training data set to be reduced.
        nIter - Number of iterations to be executed.
        percSize - Reduced size respect training set size.
        alpha_0 - Alpha0 constant parameter of the algorithm.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        General main for all the prototoype generators Arguments: 0: Filename with the training data set to be condensed. 1: Filename wich contains the test data set. 3: Number of iterations. 4: Number of prototypes to be generated. 5: Alpha constant parameter.
